lead_paragraph: PORTLAND, Ore., Aug. 16 (AP) — Emily McCarty had two run-scoring singles and Lauren Gevaart added a run-scoring double Wednesday night for Mattawan, Mich., in its 6-2 victory over Pequannock, N.J., in the Little League Softball World Series championship.
